intro: Tittelbachia castaneifolia, commonly known as the chestnut-leaf tittelbachia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, palmately lobed leaves that resemble those of the chestnut tree. It produces showy, yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Tittelbachia castaneifolia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
